question: What is the most commonly used plasticizer in the world?
ground_truth: Among all phthalate esters, di-(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate (DEHP) is the most commonly used plasticizer worldwide.
system_answer: The most commonly used plasticizer globally is Di-(2-ethylhexyl) phthalate (DEHP), widely utilized in various applications, including vinyl products and polyvinyl chloride (PVC).
